participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas through reading and appreciates the art of cooking.
participant_1.background: I love my husband's cooking, but I'm a sucker for a good piece of chocolate. I read to relax and clear my head. I am hoping to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend. I do not like waking up early. I moved out when I was 14.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, Sophie finds joy in crafting and being physically active, with a love for animals and artistic expression.
participant_2.background: I love to knit to relieve stress and keep my hands busy. I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me. I love dogs. I am a ballet dancer. I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.

content.text: Hello there! How is your day going?
It is going great! I just got done reading a book.
Oh that's awesome! I love to read too. What book were you reading?
I was reading a book about the history of ballet. I find it really interesting.
That sounds really cool! I've never been a huge fan of ballet, but I know it's a really difficult art form.
Yeah it is! I think it's amazing what they can do with their bodies.
Me too! I like to watch ballet performances sometimes.
Oh that's cool! I've never been to one in person, but I've seen some on TV.
They're really beautiful to watch. Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog named Luna. She's a golden retriever.
Oh I love golden retrievers! They're so sweet.
Yeah she is! I love her to death.
I'm glad to hear that! Do you have any other hobbies besides reading?
I like to go for walks with my dog and play video games.
Oh that's cool! I like to play video games too. What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Skyrim
